message:
只有我这样吗

Chobits Said: MySQL Query Error

Time: 2018-1-16 9:52pm
Script: /router.php

SQL: SELECT s.subject_id
FROM [Table]subjects s
WHERE subject_ban = 0 AND subject_type_id = '2' AND field_rank != 0 ORDER BY field_rank ASC LIMIT 0, 24;

Error: Unknown column 'field_rank' in 'where clause'
Errno.: 1054

Similar error report has beed dispatched to administrator before.
title: 所有类型条目的排行榜都打不开了耶
